labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The flag stays checked whether your mic is muted or not.
data.expected_result: The "Not Muted" flag should turn into an X
data.short_description: Voice chat debug menu does not recognize when you mute your mic
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into voice chat - Click the Connection Info button in the bottom left next to the disconnect - Click Debug in the bottom left - Click Flags - Mute your client with a bind
